short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change and Set Color of New Tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"New Tab Colors" allows user to set background color of new tab. Also, it shows system current date and time on new tab.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "New Tab Colors" Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing. 

Terms & Conditions: https://newtabcolors.com/terms.php
Privacy Policy: https://newtabcolors.com/privacy.php
